bibl.title: Menander's Theophoroumene between Greece and Rome. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: 1. The Pompeian fragment [Ufficio Scavi di Pompei 20545, a fragmentary fresco showing an excerpt of the climactic scene] and the iconographic tradition of Menander's Theophoroumene. - 2. Long pipes in Greece and Rome. - 3. The iconographic tradition, performance tradition, and textual transmission of the Theophoroumene. - Conclusion.
NERVEGNA Sebastiana, Menander's Theophoroumene between Greece and Rome. Avec résumé en anglais.
